adventuring_gear.name: Acid (vial)
adventuring_gear.description: As a Utilize action, you can splash the contents of this vial onto a creature within 5 feet of yourself or throw the vial up to 20 feet, shattering it on impact. In either case, make a ranged attack against a creature or object, treating the acid as an Improvised Weapon. On a hit, the target takes 2d6 Acid damage.

adventuring_gear.name: Alchemist's Fire (flask)
adventuring_gear.description: As a Utilize action, you can throw this flask up to 20 feet. Make a ranged attack against a creature or object, treating the flask as an Improvised Weapon. On a hit, the target takes 1d4 Fire damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature can end this damage by using its action to make a DC 10 Dexterity check to extinguish the flames.

adventuring_gear.name: Antitoxin (vial)
adventuring_gear.description: A creature that drinks this vial has Advantage on saving throws against poison for 1 hour.

adventuring_gear.name: Ball Bearings (bag of 1,000)
adventuring_gear.description: As a Utilize action, you can spill these tiny metal balls to cover a level, 10-foot-square area. A creature moving through the covered area must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or fall Prone. A creature moving through the area at half speed doesn't need to make the save.

adventuring_gear.name: Block and Tackle
adventuring_gear.description: A set of pulleys with a cable threaded through them and a hook to attach to objects. When you use this you can hoist up to four times the weight you can normally lift.

adventuring_gear.name: Bucket
adventuring_gear.capacity: 3 gallons liquid / ½ cubic foot solid

adventuring_gear.name: Caltrops (bag of 20)
adventuring_gear.description: As a Utilize action, you can spread the caltrops to cover a 5-foot-square area. Any creature that enters the area must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or stop moving this turn and take 1 Piercing damage. Taking this damage reduces the creature's walking speed by 10 feet until the creature regains at least 1 hit point.

adventuring_gear.name: Candle
adventuring_gear.description: For 1 hour, a candle sheds Bright Light in a 5-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 5 feet.

adventuring_gear.name: Chain (10 feet)
adventuring_gear.description: Has 10 Hit Points. It can be burst with a successful DC 20 Strength check.

adventuring_gear.name: Climber's Kit
adventuring_gear.description: Includes pitons, boot tips, gloves, and a harness. When you use the kit, you can move up or down a rock surface as though you had a Climb Speed equal to your Speed.

adventuring_gear.name: Crowbar
adventuring_gear.description: Using a crowbar gives Advantage to Strength checks where the crowbar's leverage can be applied.

adventuring_gear.name: Healer's Kit
adventuring_gear.description: This kit is a leather pouch containing bandages, salves, and splints. As a Utilize action, you can expend one use of the kit to stabilize a creature that has 0 Hit Points, without needing to make a Wisdom (Medicine) check.

adventuring_gear.name: Holy Water (flask)
adventuring_gear.description: As a Utilize action, you can splash the contents of this flask onto a creature within 5 feet of yourself or throw it up to 20 feet, shattering it on impact. Make a ranged attack against a target creature, treating the holy water as an Improvised Weapon. If the target is a Fiend or Undead, it takes 2d8 Radiant damage.

adventuring_gear.name: Hunting Trap
adventuring_gear.description: When you use this action to set it, this trap forms a saw-toothed steel ring that snaps shut when a creature steps on a pressure plate. See PHB for full mechanics.

adventuring_gear.name: Lamp
adventuring_gear.description: A lamp casts Bright Light in a 15-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 30 feet. Burns for 6 hours on a flask (1 pint) of oil.

adventuring_gear.name: Lantern, Bullseye
adventuring_gear.description: A bullseye lantern casts Bright Light in a 60-foot Cone and Dim Light for an additional 60 feet. Burns for 6 hours on a flask of oil.

adventuring_gear.name: Lantern, Hooded
adventuring_gear.description: A hooded lantern casts Bright Light in a 30-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 30 feet. Burns for 6 hours on a flask of oil. As a Utilize action, you can lower the hood, reducing the light to Dim Light in a 5-foot radius.

adventuring_gear.name: Lock
adventuring_gear.description: A key is provided. Without the key, a creature proficient with Thieves' Tools can pick this lock with a successful DC 15 Dexterity check.

adventuring_gear.name: Manacles
adventuring_gear.description: Escaping requires a DC 20 Dexterity check. Breaking requires a DC 20 Strength check. Each set includes one key.

adventuring_gear.name: Net
adventuring_gear.description: When you take the Attack action, you can replace one of your attacks with throwing a net at a creature within 15 feet. The target must succeed on a Dexterity save (DC 10) or have the Restrained condition until freed.

adventuring_gear.name: Oil (flask)
adventuring_gear.description: Oil usually comes in a clay flask. As a Utilize action, you can splash the oil onto a creature within 5 feet or throw it up to 20 feet. If the target takes Fire damage before the oil dries (1 minute), the target takes an additional 5 Fire damage from the burning oil.

adventuring_gear.name: Poison, Basic (vial)
adventuring_gear.description: As a Bonus Action, you can apply the poison to a weapon or three pieces of ammunition. A creature hit by the poisoned weapon or ammunition must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or take 1d4 Poison damage. Once applied, the poison retains potency for 1 minute before drying.

adventuring_gear.name: Potion of Healing
adventuring_gear.description: You regain 2d4+2 Hit Points when you drink this potion. Drinking or administering this potion takes a Bonus Action.

adventuring_gear.name: Ram, Portable
adventuring_gear.description: Using a portable ram gives you a +4 bonus to Strength checks made to break down doors. One other character can help you use the ram, giving you Advantage on this check.

adventuring_gear.name: Rope, Hempen (50 feet)
adventuring_gear.description: Has 2 Hit Points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

adventuring_gear.name: Rope, Silk (50 feet)
adventuring_gear.description: Has 2 Hit Points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

adventuring_gear.name: Tinderbox
adventuring_gear.description: This small container holds flint, fire steel, and tinder. Using it to light a torch—or anything else with abundant, exposed fuel—takes an action.

adventuring_gear.name: Torch
adventuring_gear.description: A torch burns for 1 hour, providing Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. If you make a melee attack with a burning torch and hit, it deals 1 Fire damage.
